body: Yeah its a shame, another good Story to leech off of but none gave much damn. Everything that are needed to make a good Hentai were all present by the OG Author: Girls just coom whenever they "enhance" their Arrows or drawing & shooting their Bows, there is even a pink hair "cutie kissy" middle schooler that been living with 3 "Android" guys and having a retractable "Grade schooler themed" Bow shoved up her ass all the time (Thats canon by the way).
